reviews.review: Even in 2022 it holds up. I didnt like Half life much, felt way too dated and storytelling wasn't good enough to keep me interested. This one however is soo much better. Graphics are sufficiently good that it doesn't bother you and storytelling has improved greatly.
Liked the story a lot. A must play for most people I would say

Ğ›ĞµĞ³ĞµĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ² 2022 Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾

If you're looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if you're looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:

1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie

Directions:

1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing.

Amazing game! A masterpiece even today. Great music that you can get for free, Amazing story that is so good I need to know what happens next, I've even changed my steam skin to look like a Combine interface! (Valve were's HL3?) and very nice game play, have played this many times over, because of the fun game play. Only thing I don't like is that they isn't any Half-life 3. After you finish playing this game, you can replay it with many good free mods out there.

Overall this game was life changing, made me want to start making games! 10/10

There isn't much to say that hasn't already been said in the past 20 years, except that it just really holds up. Even now, there are very few games that match this game's story, worldbuilding, sound design, level design, pacing, game feel, everything. It might just be perfect. If you've got some money, don't just get this one, get the entire Half-Life bundle and take a week off. These games are incredible.
